title: Lets Make an Improvement Focused Flex Team/Community! [bronze-silver-gold]
body:
Hi Everyone,

Since there is a lot of people floating around these forums looking for teams for flex and no one really recruiting lets make a team together!

Post Below With
1. Idea for Teamname
2. What attitude you bring to a team
3. Your general availability
4. What is your favourite play style or team comp
5. Your best league related pun/joke/meme
~NOTE: Champ pools and roles least important its about making a team or community that can improve together

If there are a lot of people (there are from what I see on the boards) maybe we can start an OCE low-elo community so we can get some good games with people who want to improve and have fun while doing so.

SudsyMcGee

replies.body:
This sounds fun aha 

1. Like old mate Best Evelynn i cant really think of a name, maybe when everyone comes together someone will think of an idea 
2. I would say i like to bring a supportive attitude and i guess somewhat smart but i just go with the flow aha
3. Free most of the time
4. Styling on kids with my ad role aha play aggressive bot lane if its needed
5. Biggest joke/meme? hmmm can i say reading patch notes? xD

Yea I agree lets pick a name together I will get a discord with a temp name going in the next hour I will add you and message you a link (late night at work haha). 

patch notes can be a joke. like when they 'bug fix' banner of command xD.

When instead of a LF club to boost, someone *actually* has a great club idea...

This is a brilliant idea :D This is more of what the OCE community need. 

{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}} 

1. I'm terrible with names (just look at my summoner name lol)

2. Strategy and not too much stupidity. 

3. Evenings. 

4. Eve Jg, doing my own thing, stealing Barons. 

5. Biggest joke would be my summoner name xD (although I do have my moments)

Thanks for the enthusiasm!

Skill is playtime but attitude is the catalyst

Glad to see someone like-minded ill get a public discord set up late this evening (working at the moment) and we can start to get a bit of a friendly low-elo community going.

I like your name. Must be fun to play definitely not blitz-crank.

1. I'm not good at names 
2. I'm not really sure I just shower people with 'Your A God' when people make plays or get kills
3. Usually on mostly on weekends
4. Support Thresh :D
5. Thresh Needs A Lantern Buff

Hey there.

1. No idea with names. Im not that creative.
2. Light Heartedness, never rage!
3. Every afternoon pretty much, depending on work hours and girlfriend.
4. Don't really have a favourite style, some games im happy to chill and go slow for 40, some games I want to be over in 15.
5. I've got aZilean puns.
Im a silver Mid main looking for a team lmk
We have started a discord (link below). A few of us just played a flex game together and yea we will see if it becomes a team but at the least it will be a group of people who are like minded.

I think this is a good idea, been wanting to join a team for ages now.

1. Team name could be decided when the team is formed/ everyone has gotten together.
2. My attitude could be best described as keen, and flexible as to who I am dealing with.
3. Available at pretty much all times of the day.
4. My play style is split between support mage roles, either mid or support. I can play all roles to a pretty decent level. My favorite comp up to date is the classic two mage support players mid and support, peeling an adc with an engage tank top and jg.
5. My best meme to say would be that I used to be a Yasuo main until I got an arrow of shame to the knee one day.

Hey

Sounds great join up to the discord when you get a chance we are just chatting in general. I like that comp. Always good to have flexible players around who are team focused.

https://discord.gg/tPPpFnf

Does age matter if not im 11 but ill answer the questions

1. Maybe NBK (Nothing but kills)
2. I mean I can get toxic from time to time but not much anymore.
3. I can play most of the day most sundays and saturdays and weekdays in the afternoon
4. Get fed as yasuo and 3 shot everyone
5. Is this one necessary?

No worries join the discord. Im sure most of us will be older but as long as you are focused on improving i'm sure people wont mind the high pitch voice ha ha. As for the toxicity as long as you are trying to be calm and are self-aware I don't think people would have a problems :).

https://discord.gg/tPPpFnf

I like this idea :D

1. No idea, maybe we can pool some names and pull 3 from a "hat" see what we get.
2. Very chill, i dont rage or get toxic dont see a point to, I do however get a little loud and excitable during 5man fights and ganks
3. Mostly late nights, after 1am onwards. (unless got an RDO)
4. Mainly ADC or TOP
5. Dont have one, haha xD

Cheers :)

Here is a temporary discord we can use for the moment i'm sure we will get a few more people over the next week like us.

https://discord.gg/tPPpFnf
